column2: We have job opening for  Sr. Microbiologist  - Experience in Agri / Food / Neutraceutical Industry only must apply  Job Location:  Ahmedabad  Role & responsibilities:   Testing of various Agri & food products,  Microbiology testing, method development, capability development, validation & calibrations etc To work as a team member for maintenance of Quality Management System of Laboratory. Testing of various Microbiology test parameters, testing using rapid methods. Trouble shooting on instruments. Work as a team member for maintenance of Quality Management System and accreditations, e.g. ISO 17025, EIC, APEDA, OSHAS and according to SGS India QMS. Validations of test methods & equipment; calibrations of instruments and updation of documentation. Execution of OI guidelines at local level. Participation in PT/ILC programs and Internal QA check programs. 7 Key Results Areas ( KRAs) & Key Deliverables: Timely execution of jobs of OI at lab level. TAT of lab production Maintenance of accreditations Preferred candidate profile:   Through Knowledge of fundamentals of Microbiology and Taxonomy. Developing new Test parameters according to various methodology. Knowledge of statistical analysis of analytical results/six sigma Soft skills Perks and benefits: As per Co. standards
